full_threads.body:
Thanks Joel, looks to be working fine. Thank you

Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis

Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist, Team Leader & Business Development Assistant (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy

Hi Remona,

We are looking into this, the form is showing on my end.
Can you try again? We have cleared the site and server cache.
https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/new-paediatric-clients/

full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

full_threads.body:

Please see email chain below. Could this please be rectified urgently? Thank you.

Remona Sarkis

Hi ladies

You need to click on new clients and then the different categories come up for enquiries. Let me know if it's still not working. It's good on my end

Sent from my iPhone
